src:
Kecelakaan Bus dan Truk di Tol Karawang Km 50, Lalin Macet 2 Km
02 Nov 2019, 19:25 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Kecelakaan lalu lintas terjadi di ruas Tol Karawang Barat arah Cikampek. Sebuah bus dan truk mengalami tabrakan.
"Di sekitar Km 50. Sudah ada petugas di lokasi," kata petugas call center PT Jasa Marga, Pinky, ketika dimintai konfirmasi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pinky menyampaikan kecelakaan terjadi di lajur 1 dan 2 atau bagian kiri ruas jalan tol. Akibat peristiwa ini, lalu lintas menuju lokasi mengalami kemacetan sepanjang 2 kilometer.
"Informasinya (kendaraan) sudah mulai padat dari Km 48. Kejadian (kecelakaan)-nya pukul 18.10 WIB," ujar Pinky.
Pinky belum dapat memastikan ada atau tidaknya korban dalam kejadian ini.




(aud/fdu)
text:
Bus and Truck Accidents in Karawang Toll Km 50, Lalin Macet 2 Km
02 Nov 2019, 19:25 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - A traffic accident occurred at the Karawang Barat Toll Road in the direction of Cikampek. A bus and truck crashed.
"Around Km 50. There are already officers at the location," said PT Jasa Marga call center officer, Pinky, when asked to confirm AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Pinky said that the accident occurred on lanes 1 and 2 or the left side of the toll road section. As a result of this event, traffic to the location has been jammed along 2 kilometers.
"The information (vehicles) have started to be congested from Km 48. The incident (accident) was at 18.10 WIB," Pinky said.
Pinky could not confirm whether or not there were victims in this incident.




(aud / fdu)
